named-query.name: withManagerById
named-query.query: select (fullName,address) fetch manager (lastName) where fullName.lastName = :lastName order by id desc

raw-sql.name: byEmailAddressEquals
raw-sql.query: select * from user where email_address = :emailAddress order by id desc

raw-sql.name: userInfo
raw-sql.query: select first_name, last_name, email_address from user

raw-sql.name: userInfoByEmail
raw-sql.query: select first_name, last_name, email_address from user where email_address = :emailAddress order by id desc
